EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry (1321550008.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry (1321550008.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Tom,
It has been a few weeks since our initial call was postponed and I wanted to follow up with you to see if you would still like to speak with me about the services MBO provides. I have included a link to my calendar below for you to schedule a call that works for your schedule.
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
I look forward to speaking with you!
Have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: tom gentile [mailto:tomgentile2000@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, October 19, 2011 1:17 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Inquiry
Let me investigate times then for Monday.
On Wed, Oct 19, 2011 at 1:00 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Tom,
Thank you for letting me know J Please just follow my calendar link from my first email to reschedule. I will be out of the office on Friday but will be back in on Monday.
Thank you and have a great day,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Tom Gemtile [mailto:tomgentile2000@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, October 19, 2011 12:36 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Inquiry
Have to reschedule for later in week. Got called to 1 pm meeting
Sent from my iPhone
On Oct 18, 2011, at 6:18 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Dear Thomas, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services or answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube: http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4.
I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners!
Have a great evening, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
